com.salesforce.perfeng.uiperf.imageoptimization.service

Class ImageOptimizationService<C>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.perfeng.uiperf.imageoptimization.service.ImageOptimizationService<C>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - Contains the changeList information.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IImageOptimizationService<C>

    public class ImageOptimizationService<C>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IImageOptimizationService<C>
    Service used to perform the optimization of images.
    Since:
    186.internal
    Author:
    eperret (Eric Perret)

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImageOptimizationService

        public ImageOptimizationService(java.io.File tmpWorkingDirectory,
                        java.io.File binaryDirectory)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor that sets the working directories and root directories.
        Parameters:
        tmpWorkingDirectory - This is the temp directory where all of the images will be optimized from and stored before they are checked back into P4.
        binaryDirectory - The location the binary image compression programs are located.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown when interacting with the tmpWorkingDirectory

    • Method Detail

      • createInstance

        public static final <C> ImageOptimizationService<C> createInstance(java.lang.String pathToBinaryProgramsForImageOptimizationDirectory)
                                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Used to create a new instance of this class.
        Type Parameters:
        C - Holds the changelist information.
        Parameters:
        pathToBinaryProgramsForImageOptimizationDirectory - This is the location where the image optimization binary applications are location. It can be relative or absolute.
        Returns:
        An instance of this class.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown when creating the tmp working directory

      • copyFileToMinifiedDirectory

        java.io.File copyFileToMinifiedDirectory(java.io.File masterFile,
                                       java.io.File workingFile,
                                       boolean fileTypeChanged)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Copies the image from the working temp directory to the correct directory under min where all of the optimized images will be stored.
        Parameters:
        masterFile - The original image.
        workingFile - The optimized file.
        fileTypeChanged - true if the file changed extensions / mime types.
        Returns:
        The File pointing to the final location of the optimized file. It can return null if creating the optimized file would overwrite an existing file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Can be thrown when copying the file.

      • optimizeAllImages

        public java.util.List<OptimizationResult<C>> optimizeAllImages(IImageOptimizationService.FileTypeConversion conversionType,
                                                      boolean includeWebPConversion,
                                                      java.util.Collection<java.io.File> files)
                                                        throws ImageFileOptimizationException
        Optimizes all of the passed in images. This process is multi-threaded so that the number of threads is equal to the number of CPUs.
        Specified by:
        optimizeAllImages in interface IImageOptimizationService<C>
        Parameters:
        conversionType - If and how to handle converting images from one type to another.
        includeWebPConversion - If true then the a WebP version of the image will also be generated (if it is smaller).
        files - The images to optimize
        Returns:
        The results from the optimization. All items in the List are considered optimized, not null, and will exclude images that could not be optimized to a smaller size.
        Throws:
        ImageFileOptimizationException - If there are any issues optimizing an image.
        See Also:
        optimizeAllImages(com.salesforce.perfeng.uiperf.imageoptimization.service.IImageOptimizationService.FileTypeConversion, boolean, File...), IImageOptimizationService.optimizeAllImages(FileTypeConversion, boolean, Collection)

      • optimizeAllImages

        public java.util.List<OptimizationResult<C>> optimizeAllImages(IImageOptimizationService.FileTypeConversion conversionType,
                                                      boolean includeWebPConversion,
                                                      java.io.File... files)
                                                        throws ImageFileOptimizationException
        Optimizes all of the passed in images. This process is multi-threaded so that the number of threads is equal to the number of CPUs.
        Specified by:
        optimizeAllImages in interface IImageOptimizationService<C>
        Parameters:
        conversionType - If and how to handle converting images from one type to another.
        includeWebPConversion - If true then the a WebP version of the image will also be generated (if it is smaller).
        files - The images to optimize
        Returns:
        The results from the optimization. All items in the List are considered optimized, not null, and will exclude images that could not be optimized to a smaller size.
        Throws:
        ImageFileOptimizationException - If there are any issues optimizing an image.
        See Also:
        optimizeAllImages(com.salesforce.perfeng.uiperf.imageoptimization.service.IImageOptimizationService.FileTypeConversion, boolean, Collection), IImageOptimizationService.optimizeAllImages(com.salesforce.perfeng.uiperf.imageoptimization.service.IImageOptimizationService.FileTypeConversion, boolean, java.io.File[])

      • executeAdvpng

        final java.io.File executeAdvpng(java.io.File workingFile,
                         java.lang.String workingFilePath)
                          throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                 ThirdPartyBinaryNotFoundException
        Executes the binary "advpng" to optimize the input file.
        Parameters:
        workingFile - The file to optimize
        workingFilePath - The path to the file to optimize
        Returns:
        the optimized file
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the optimization was interrupted.
        ThirdPartyBinaryNotFoundException - Thrown if the "advpng" application does not exist.

      • executeCWebp

        final java.io.File executeCWebp(java.io.File workingFile,
                        java.lang.String workingFilePath)
                         throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                ThirdPartyBinaryNotFoundException
        Executes the binary "cwebp" to convert the input file to a smaller file. The resulting image is only supported by Chrome and Opera
        Parameters:
        workingFile - The file to convert
        workingFilePath - The path to the file to convert
        Returns:
        The converted file
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the optimization was interrupted.
        ThirdPartyBinaryNotFoundException - Thrown if the "cwebp" application does not exist.

                           java.lang.String workingFilePath)
                            throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                   ThirdPartyBinaryNotFoundException
        Executes the binary "gif2webp" to convert the input file to a smaller file. The resulting image is only supported by Chrome and Opera
        Parameters:
        workingFile - The file to convert
        workingFilePath - The path to the file to convert
        Returns:
        The converted file
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the optimization was interrupted.
        ThirdPartyBinaryNotFoundException - Thrown if the "gif2webp" application does not exist.
